title: Katra India Hotel Near Vaishno Devi Shrine in the Lower Himalayas
description: Be perfectly positioned to explore the spiritual site of Vaishno Devi and the glorious Trikuta Mountains at Holiday Inn Katra Vaishno Devi, an IHG Hotel. Situated in the foothills of the lower Himalayas, Katra is the jumping-off point for journeys to the holy cave shrine of Vaishno Devi, whether you're visiting on foot or by helicopter. Fuel up with delicacies from across the world at the hotel's all-day restaurant Viva or recharge your mind and body at the onsite fitness centre.
location_description: Holiday Inn Katra Vaishno Devi, an IHG Hotel
